# greynoise_sensor_metadata (Resource)

Sensor metadata resource is used to manage metadata about a sensor.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `sensor_id` (String) UUID of the sensor.

### Optional

- `name` (String) Name of the sensor.
